stays.desc: Offering stylish rooms with great views, free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour restaurant serving European and Turkish cuisine, this design hotel in Almaty is 3.1 mi from the Atakent Exhibition Center.
This luxury 5-star hotel is located in Almaty city center, 0.6 mi from Nikolai Cathedral. Rixos Almaty Hotel offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi internet and a spa with swimming pool.

Aidana Plaza Hotel in Shymkent has 4-star accommodations with a restaurant and a bar. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.
Hotel Astam features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Kostanay. The hotel provides both free WiFi and free private parking.
